{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amazon |model=Fire TV |revision=(CL1130) |upc= |ean= |asin=B00CX5P8FC;US; |price=99.99 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/11/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U73X003 |manuf_rev=.00 |availability=common |type=media streamer |fcc_id=S59-4891,PPD-QCA6234 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=6.25 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=APQ8064T |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=THGBM5G6A2JBAIR |fla1_num= |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K3PE0E00QM-CGC2 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Qualcomm Atheros QCA6234 |wi1_module_if=SIP (on-board) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR6004 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR3002 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |txchains=2 |rxchains=2 |sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8152-B |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI out, TOSLINK audio out |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |category=media receiver }} {{TagLine|Digital Media Receiver}} This is [[Roku]]-esque media streaming device / general purpose TV computer :(gaming console functionality, w/ tailored game controllers). :It's pretty beefy. The bar is obviously being raised for [[Roku]] + competitors.. This device was filed under a grantee code of a random LLC (''Ailen LLC''), :which ''Amazon'' has been doing for a while.. ===Additional specs, from Amazon=== *Streaming services: Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon Prime Instant Video *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::115 mm x 115 mm x 17.5 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::281 g]] ==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *{{WPLink|Amazon Fire TV}} ===Teardowns=== *[http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Amazon+Fire+TV+Teardown/23856 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] (and their general [http://www.ifixit.com/Device/Amazon_Fire_TV '''Fire TV''' portal] page) :Specifications used in this entry are per '''iFixit''''s teardown.. :("PCB: 30-000772 REV 05" and "PCBA: 31-000797 REV") and :("U73X003T00", "REV.2 GP", "000506") is silkscreened on the board shown. :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] APQ8064 ([https://www.qualcomm.com/products/snapdragon/processors/s4-s1 Snapdragon]) quad-core @1.7GHz :*Flash: [[Toshiba]] THGBM5G6A2JBAIR 8GB eMMC NAND :*RAM: [[Samsung]] K3PE0E00QM-CGC2 2GB LPDDR2 @533MHz :*GPU: [[Qualcomm]] Adreno 320 dedicated GPU :*PMU: [[Qualcomm]] PMM8920 Power Management IC :*Eth: [[Atheros]] AR8152-B PCIe Fast Ethernet Controller :*Clock: ''Pericom'' PI6C557-03ALE PCIe Clock :*Audio: [[Texas Instruments]] DIT4192 Digital Audio Transmitter :*WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6234XH ([[Qualcomm Atheros QCA6234]]) ::integrated dual-band 2x2 802.11n + Bluetooth 4.0 chip ::the same seen on the [[Amazon Kindle Fire HDX, 2013, 7" w/ Wi-Fi (C9R6QM)|Amazon Kindle Fire 7" HDX]] ==Device specifications== *[https://developer.amazon.com/public/solutions/devices/fire-tv/docs/device-and-platform-specifications ''Device and Platform Specifications'' on Amazon] {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="3px" style="border: 1px solid black; border-spacing: 0px; width: 100%; text-align:center;" |- !
